text: Pilar Partido is a partido in the northern part of Greater Buenos Aires in Buenos Aires Province, Argentina. The provincial subdivision has a population of about 232,000 inhabitants in an area of , and its capital city is Pilar, which is around from Buenos Aires. It has universities and schools. ==Settlements== * Pilar * Del Viso * Derqui * Fátima * La Lonja * Manuel Alberti * Manzanares * Villa Rosa * Villa Astolfi * Zelaya. ==Gallery== File:Pilar BarrioCerrado August2017.jpg|Gated neighborhoods are common in Pilar ==External links== * Pilar.com (Spanish) * Map of Pilar (Spanish) Category:Partidos of Buenos Aires Province
title: Pilar Partido
